name: Correspondence
description:
If your Browser struggles to run the game try toggle on Hardware Acceleration or feel free to download the Windows version below.

Congratulation, your application has been accepted and you've been chosen to work for Interstellar Mail Incorporate. It is an honor to have you with us, you'll be a valuable asset to the company. 

We'll be flying you to your station, Hermes-25 in Quadrant - G6 first thing tonight, and you can immediately begin tomorrow. Enjoy our facility and remember IMI connect the cosmos so no one will ever be alone. 

Movement Controls:

W  =  forward 

A = Left

S = Down 

D= Right

Quotes:

"It's not about wining, it's about sending a message"

Credits:

  • Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
  • Additional sound effects obtain from https://mixkit.co
  • Main menu music - https://dova-s.jp/bgm/play17203.html
